metadata.name: AppX Package Installation Attempts Via AppInstaller.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects DNS queries made by "AppInstaller.EXE". The AppInstaller is the default handler for the "ms-appinstaller" URI. It attempts to load/install a package from the referenced URL

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\program files\\windowsapps\\microsoft.desktopappinstaller_')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\appinstaller.exe')))

output.summary: Detects DNS queries made by "AppInstaller.EXE". The AppInstaller is the default handler for the "ms-appinstaller" URI. It attempts to load/install a package from the referenced URL
